nodes.text: House Baliss was the second estate of House Baliss, one of the Great Houses of Alderaan. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the House Baliss remained neutral when the Alderaan Civil War broke out, but their original estate was overrun by the native Killiks and abandoned. Duke Yun Baliss conquered the estate of the House Teraan after House Baliss was forced to retreat there, making their estate the family's new home.
